short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that allows you to watch movies with your friends

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can watch movies on every page you want with your friends synchronously using this extension! 

Just download the extension with your friends, connect to the same session and go to the web page you want to watch a movie. Activate the extension by connecting to a room. Select the video frame from the menu that is on top right of the page. Enjoy!
